title: Start to Start with Jake Irvin
description: The first in a series of 5 videos created throughout the series, I went behind the scenes with starting pitcher Jake Irvin to show our fans how he stays healthy and prepared between starts.

meta.role: Camera Operator, Editor, Producer and Director

title: Coaching Staff Visit to VA Hospital
description: Being in DC allows for our team to play a very active role in supporting our military. On this occasion, members of our coaching staff took the time to visit patiences doing long-term care at a local VA hospital.

title: Golfing with The Nationals
description: During spring training, four Nationals players took on the nine-hole Par 3 course at Panther National near West Palm Beach, FL. This is one of my more ambitious projects to-date.

title: 30-Second Promo for Bourbon Event
description: Nationals Park often opens its doors for events outside of baseball and I created this promo video, along with a collection of short versions in various ratios for social media channels, to promote our inaugural 'BBQ and Barrels' event.

title: James Wood Call-Up
description: One of the most anticipated call-ups in all of baseball during the 2024 season, I edited this short hype video featuring our footage and some art and highlights provided by our minor league affiliates, to release the morning of his debut on July 1st.

title: The Green Monster Tour
description: It's tradition for players who have never been to Fenway Park in Boston to take a tour of the inside of the famous 'Green Monster' wall in left field. With such a young roster, we had a pretty large group who took a look around and signed their names. This also aired on our RSN during the series.

title: 2024 Opening Day Hype
description: Going into the 2024 season, we launched a multifaceted campaign that focused on our history and our future. To kick-off the 'history' portion of this campaign, I wrote the script and directed this shoot with Ryan Zimmerman.

title: Nationals Manager Dave Martinez, Mic'd Up
description: With the start of every season, we work to create unique content that helps our fans get to know our team better. What better way to start the 2023 season than following our manager, Dave Martinez, for an entire day at spring training?

title: NEXT 2018 - Corcoran School of Arts & Design
description: Held every spring, NEXT is a dynamic, interactive and innovative end-of-year show that gives D.C.â€™s art community the opportunity to see the latest in contemporary art from fresh perspectives. Visitors have the opportunity to observe thesis critiques and discussions between students in the fields of studio arts, art history, interior architecture, design, dance, theatre, music and museum studies and faculty, while students are able to build connections with potential employers and art dealers.

title: Nats on Base Abroad: July 4th in Qatar
description: In 2023, I was part of a coalition to Doha, Qatar and Al Udeid Air Base where we shot and edited multiple pieces of content for in-game playback and recaps. We also set-up and executed a live stream from the air base back to Nationals Park.

title: 2019 Nationals Wild Card Game Fan Footage Recap
description: I will never forget covering the 2019 Wild Card game at Nationals Park, and it was clear on social media that our fans agreed. The day after the win, I gathered various videos from across multiple platforms, mixed with broadcast highlights, my footage, and fan interviews, to help retell the story of a historic night in DC.

title: 'Silence and Beauty' by Makoto Fujiimura
description: Shusaku Endo's 'Silence' took internationally renowned visual artist Makoto Fujimura on a pilgrimage of grappling with the nature of art, the significance of pain and his own cultural heritage. His artistic faith journey overlaps with Endo's as he uncovers deep layers of meaning in Japanese history and literature, expressed in art both past and present. He finds connections to how faith is lived in contemporary contexts of trauma and glimpses of how the gospel is conveyed in Christ-hidden cultures.

title: 2019 World Series Recap
description: In my first full baseball season I was lucky enough to cover a 2019 World Series Championship win. This recap tells just a small part of the story from sweeping the St. Louis Cardinals in 4 games, to winning games 6 and 7 on the road in Houston.

title: 2022 Washington Nationals 'City Connect' In-Game Hype Video
description: After the launch of the cherry blossom 'City Connect' jerseys, our game production staff created an entirely new look and feel for the in-game experience when the team wore them on field. Part of that presentation are videos like this one, which was played in-park right before the team took the field to start the game.

title: The Common Year Vol. 3 - Lupe Carroll
description: A passion project while I lived in Chicago, 'The Common Year' was a video series released on a monthly basis around the idea of finding beauty in the common: not just the ordinary but what we all share. I served on the leadership team for 4 years and we released nearly 50 videos in that time, including this video of a local musician covering the song 'Winning Streak' by Glen Hansard.

title: Washington Nationals Big Leaguers Take on Little League Classic
description: Watch the Washington Nationals experience one of the best days in baseball: The Little League Classic. CJ Abrams, Lane Thomas, Josiah Gray, Davey Martinez and the rest of the Nats spent the day at the Little League World Series celebrating the joys of Little League Baseball before their matchup against the Philadelphia Phillies.
